texts: When you have filled in the application form you can upload it, along with your supporting evidence, using the link below. We need to see evidence that the vehicle meets the LEZ emission standards to process your application. The evidence we require is detailed in the registration form.
You can scan paper documents to your computer, or take photographs of them with your camera, smartphone or tablet. Youâ€™ll need to save each file as a .jpg, .jpeg, .tif, .tiff or .pdf.

Once you have saved your document(s) on your computer/mobile device, drag them into the box below or click 'Or browse to your files' and select the file you want to upload. Remember to double check you have selected the correct file.
Repeat for every document you want to attach. If you make a mistake, you can add or remove files before submitting your application.
